data.title: Bulletin of the American Mathematical Society
data.text:
Book Review

The AMS does not provide abstracts of book reviews. You may download the entire review from the links below.

MathSciNet review: 1567232

Full text of review: PDF This review is available free of charge.

Book Information:

Authors: Murray C. Kemp and Yoshio Kimura

Title: Introduction to mathematical economics

Additional book information: Springer-Verlag, New York-Heidelberg-Berlin, 1978, vi + 249 pp., $19.80.
